item.title: #36 - Twitter and Tech Crunch Mashup
item.description: Consciousness and Paradigm Shifts, Moderating Conversations, Creating Communities, Doc Jones and Emerita, Crypto or No Crypto?

item.title: #35 - Random Thoughts
item.description: Thoughts on value vs growth, NFTs, and Canadian politics.

item.title: #16 - The Long Game
item.description: Why writing is a form of compounding

item.title: Closing the loop on Aimia and Energy
Quotes (growing)
item.description: A wise man’s life is based around FUCK YOU. The Gambler You know how I stayed alive this long, all these years?

item.title: Thoughts on the pandemic and the vaccine
item.description: UPDATE (2021-12-09) To boost or not to boost If you’ve been following me and reading my crazy midnight tweets, you know I was hesitant to vaccinate initially (because of unknown risks), but I did it after some time.

item.title: Why I Write
item.description: Satisfying my ego Why do I write, and why do I publish on this lame page that nobody knows about?

item.title: Housing Madness
item.description: My wife found a house she likes for sale today. Asking price around $550K. House has been on the market for one day.
